title: ## NLP for Chemistry: A Reading List
This list focuses on recent advancements in NLP for chemistry, covering various applications and techniques. It includes both research papers and review articles
** **"Deep Learning for Chemistry: A Review"**
note: by **Liu, et al.** (**Nature Reviews Chemistry**) - A comprehensive overview of deep learning applications in chemistry, including NLP techniques.

title: ** **"Predicting Chemical Reactions with Natural Language Processing"**
by **Zhou, et al.** (**ACS Central Science**) - Explores the use of NLP for predicting reaction outcomes and designing new synthetic pathways
** **"Chemical Language Models: A New Frontier in Chemistry"**
by **Coley, et al.** (**Journal of Chemical Information and Modeling**) - Discusses the development and applications of chemical language models for various tasks
** **"Graph Neural Networks for Molecular Property Prediction"**
note: by **Gilmer, et al.** (**Journal of Chemical Physics**) - Focuses on the use of graph neural networks, a powerful NLP technique, for predicting molecular properties.

title: ** **"Natural Language Processing for Drug Discovery"**
by **Gupta, et al.** (**Drug Discovery Today**) - Explores the role of NLP in drug discovery, including target identification, lead optimization, and clinical trial analysis
** **"Machine Learning for Materials Discovery: A Review"**
by **Jain, et al.** (**Nature Reviews Materials**) - Discusses the use of NLP and other machine learning techniques for materials discovery and design
** **"Text Mining for Chemical Safety"**
by **Li, et al.** (**Chemical Engineering Journal**) - Explores the application of NLP for extracting safety information from chemical literature and databases
** **"Predicting Chemical Reactions with Transformers"**
by **Wang, et al.** (**Journal of the American Chemical Society**) - Demonstrates the use of transformer models for predicting reaction outcomes and generating synthetic routes
** **"Natural Language Processing for Chemical Synthesis Planning"**
by **Zhang, et al.** (**Chemical Science**) - Explores the use of NLP for automating chemical synthesis planning and optimization

note: by **Chen, et al.** (**Journal of Cheminformatics**) - Presents a BERT-based model for identifying chemical entities in text.

title: **"Multi-Task Learning for Chemical Property Prediction"**
by **Xu, et al.** (**ACS Omega**) - Explores the use of multi-task learning with NLP for predicting multiple chemical properties simultaneously
** **"Generative Adversarial Networks for Molecular Design"**
by **Li, et al.** (**Nature Communications**) - Discusses the use of GANs, a type of generative model, for designing new molecules with desired properties
** **"Chemical Language Understanding with Graph Convolutional Networks"**
by **Wu, et al.** (**Journal of Machine Learning Research**) - Explores the use of graph convolutional networks for understanding chemical language and predicting properties
** **"Natural Language Processing for Chemical Education"**
by **Smith, et al.** (**Journal of Chemical Education**) - Discusses the use of NLP for developing interactive learning tools and personalized educational resources
by **Wang, et al.** (**Journal of Chemical Information and Modeling**) - Explores the use of NLP for retrieving relevant chemical information from large databases and literature
by **Zhang, et al.** (**Environmental Science & Technology**) - Discusses the use of NLP for predicting chemical toxicity and assessing environmental risks
** **"Natural Language Processing for Chemical Reaction Optimization"**
by **Li, et al.** (**Organic Process Research & Development**) - Explores the use of NLP for optimizing chemical reactions and improving synthetic yields
** **"Chemical Language Models for Drug Repurposing"**
by **Chen, et al.** (**Journal of Medicinal Chemistry**) - Discusses the use of chemical language models for identifying potential drug repurposing candidates
** **"Natural Language Processing for Chemical Data Analysis"**
by **Liu, et al.** (**Analytical Chemistry**) - Explores the use of NLP for analyzing chemical data, including spectroscopic data and chromatography data
** **"Chemical Language Understanding with Transformers"**
Discusses the use of transformer models for understanding chemical language and predicting properties
This list provides a starting point for exploring the exciting field of NLP for chemistry. Remember to search for more recent articles and publications as the field continues to evolve rapidly
